mapper.select: SELECT a.task_status applyTaskStatus, coalesce(a.apply_result, 999999) applyResult, coalesce(a.push_result, 999999) pushResult, coalesce(b.task_status, 999999) queryTaskStatus, coalesce(b.query_result, 999999) queryResult, coalesce(c.task_status, 999999) mprTaskStatus, coalesce(c.mpr_result, 999999) mprResult FROM tb_keya_apply_task a LEFT JOIN tb_keya_query_task b ON a.compute_task_id = b.compute_task_id LEFT JOIN tb_mpr_task c ON a.compute_task_id = c.compute_task_id WHERE a.compute_task_id = #{computeTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
